duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain clean and attractive guest rooms, hallways, and public areas in the hotel, servicing guest rooms daily in accordance with hotel procedures.
Stocking cart with room supplies and replacing bed linens and replenishing guest room supplies while following company standards and safety/security procedures.
Conducting deep cleaning activities within the guest room in conjunction with preventative maintenance tasks.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent and/or experience in a hotel or a related field preferred.
